intigration_system: you can add your invitaion card to your {{platform}} wallet
test_invitaion: You are trying out a trial invitation. Thank you for using the Arhaba platform for electronic invitations We hope you like our platform
features_title: Are you ready to explore the smart invitation experience with Erhbo?

invitationDetails.title: Instantly view your invitation details
invitationDetails.description: With the "Erhbo" app, you can easily view the invitation details, learn about the invitee, and check their personal QR code, as well as the number of guests accompanying them. All this with just a click!

addToWallet.title: Add the invitation to your digital wallet
addToWallet.description: Don’t miss your important invitations! Now you can save the invitation directly to your Google or Apple wallet, so you’ll be fully prepared when attending the event.

thankYouMessage.title: Personal Thank You Message
thankYouMessage.description: Add a personal touch to the invitation! Write a thank you message directly to the person who invited you, leaving a great impression and enhancing your communication.

footerText: These features make "Erhbo" the perfect choice for managing your invitations and tracking attendance with ease and simplicity. Get the app now for a unique experience!
